errors.error_description: Added unnecessary system dependencies installation that are not required for PyMarkdown
correction_candidates: Remove the system package installation step as PyMarkdown only requires Python 3.8 or later
Replace with pip install pymarkdownlnt command instead of system packages
Change to conda install python3-dev libffi-dev for cross-platform compatibility
Update to use brew install python3-dev libffi-dev for macOS users
errors.golden_answer: Remove the system package installation step as PyMarkdown only requires Python 3.8 or later
